thirst.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the feeling of wanting or needing a drink
thirst.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Ice water is the only thing that really quenches my thirst  (=gets rid of it).
We had worked up a thirst  (=done something that made us thirsty), and so we decided to stop for a beer.
Maggie woke up with a raging thirst  (=an extremely strong thirst).
thirst.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the state of not having enough to drink
thirst.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Many of the animals had died of thirst.
